p.k: Four Color Fallout / Grin and Bear It / Green with Envy / Return of Thermometron 9000 Axel Galileo and Sarge get Minergy-transported by Madcap into the pages of Axel's favorite comic book the hero of which turns out not to be so cool after all. / When a toothache sends Axel to the dentist the team must fight off Princess SugarSalt who confuses Axel's new crown for the real thing. / When Uncle Andrew is interviewed about his toy inventing, an envious Galileo stages a play in the park with the help of the team only to be interrupted by an envious Madcap. / During a brutal heatwave Axel and his team must track down Thermometron 9000, stolen by Ice Crusher.
